post.author: Admin
post.title: Senior Band Night 2016
post.description: Honoring all Senior band students and their parents Reception will be Friday, October 7, 2016 5:00 -
post.content:
You are cordially invited to attend:

The North Royalton High School Marching Band’s Senior Band Night

Honoring all Senior band students and their parents

Reception will be Friday, October 7, 2016
5:00 - 6:15PM
Dinner will be served at 5:15 PM in Cafeteria II (by the band room)

Marge Walter Caterers is catering:

Baked Chicken Breast with Gravy

Or

Penne Rigatoni with Marinara Sauce (Vegetarian option)

  • Green Beans
  • Scalloped Potatoes
  • Tossed Salad
  • Freshly Baked Italian Bread
  • Bakery and Beverages will be served

At the reception, all Seniors will receive Corsages or Boutonnieres and their Mother will receive a Rose.

RSVP Card is due by September 30, 2016. Download RSVP Card

  • 6:40PM — Pre-Game Show / Homecoming Activities
  • 7:00PM — Home Football Game

Two complimentary admissions to the football game will be granted per family. This will be based on the information provided on the RSVP Card. Please check in at the SOUTH END gate where the North Royalton High School Marching and enters and exits the field.

After PRE-GAME show, parents can meet with their Senior band member behind the band bleachers at the south end of the football field. Pictures will be taken and line up will begin.

During HALF-TIME of the football game, Seniors and their parents will be announced and recognized on the football field.
